text.name: sys_description
text.text: The TIC-80 is a fantasy console, a system that was never created and released by a manufacturer but instead just the engine for a fictional videogame console. The graphical display is limited to 16 colors with a resolution of 240x136 pixels, sound is limited to 4 separate channels. The integrated development tool allows for the creation of sprites, sounds and backgrounds in the game itself, even producing the final "cart" file to share with others. A demake of the fantastic platformer Super Meat Boy was made for this system.
